    C

    camera - Variable in class fr.florian.Main
    The camera used to view and navigate the 3D scene.
    Camera - Class in fr.florian.engine.objects
    Represents a free-fly 3D camera controlled via keyboard and mouse input.
    Camera(Vector3f, Vector3f) - Constructor for class fr.florian.engine.objects.Camera
    Constructs a new camera with a given position and rotation.
    Chunk - Class in fr.florian.engine.objects
    Represents a chunk in the voxel world, composed of a 3D array of blocks.
    Chunk(Vector3f) - Constructor for class fr.florian.engine.objects.Chunk
    Initializes the chunk at the given world position and starts parallel generation.
    chunk1 - Variable in class fr.florian.Main
    A single chunk displayed in the scene.
    create() - Method in class fr.florian.engine.graphics.Material
    Loads the image from the classpath and creates an OpenGL texture.
    create() - Method in class fr.florian.engine.graphics.Mesh
    Creates the OpenGL VAO, VBOs and IBO, and uploads vertex/index data to GPU memory.
    create() - Method in class fr.florian.engine.graphics.Shader
    Compiles the vertex and fragment shaders and links them into a shader program.
    create() - Method in class fr.florian.engine.io.Window
    Initializes GLFW, creates the window, and sets up the OpenGL context and callbacks.
    createCubeMesh(Material) - Static method in class fr.florian.engine.objects.Blocks
    Creates a cube mesh with the given material.
